{{Description|Sucrose used to give names to her volatile [[Anemo Hypostases]], but their line of heirs quickly grew to surpass [[Baron Bunny]] the 893rd.}}
'''Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II''' is [[Sucrose]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Elemental Burst has a total of three pulses.
* {{TalentNote|icd|All DMG dealt by this ability|0|plural=1}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|Beth: Unbound Form}} This adds one pulse for a total of four pulses.
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Caution: Standard Flask}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Chaotic Entropy}}
